title: Promotion
body: Guys i was in my promo series from s3 to s2. I win the first game and lose at the second and when the second game ends it tells me that i was fail my promos...but i still had the third game to play ..what the fuckk happend?...

replies.body: Looking over your match history, it looks like you lost the first game in your miniseries, won the second, then had a queue dodge and a loss. Keep in mind that queue dodges will count as a loss when [**queueing for ranked**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h2q2).
